sentence:
…of the Nation on Alabama and  Auburn men's basketball as they compete in the NCAA March Madness  championship tournament, I would like to also shed a light on the  outstanding high school basketball players in Alabama's Seventh  Congressional District who led their teams to championship victories  this season.
